extendedInfo.description: Halal Trade Manager Mobile provides the easiest and fastest way to add new Halal products  to the e-Catalog via Android devices.This App is specially designed for DagangHalal merchants to enhance the selling experience in Halal e-Markeplace. DagangHalal is the leading online marketplace for Halal Industry featuring thousands of products and genuine buyers.No more hassle and tedious works to upload your products from digital camera to Halal e-Marketplace. It is now in your hand! You can start selling Halal Products less than 1 minute with your androidâs camera.

reviews.title: Good apps to save time to upload new product
reviews.comment: Uploaded product pictures can\'t display in ratio. Overall good job. Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
